price: Guyyaa samiin aara ifa ba’aan dhuftu (waan isaan mudatu) eegi.
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
